title: Kickstarter Campaign Strategy
description: Detailed specifications for a successful Kickstarter campaign that will serve as the product launch platform.
requirements: Campaign funding goal based on actual production costs
Tiered reward structure with early-bird incentives
Compelling campaign video script and storyboard
Backer engagement and community building plan
acceptance: Funding goal must cover all production and fulfillment costs
Delivery timeline must include reasonable buffer for delays
Reward tiers must maintain profitable unit economics
Marketing plan must reach minimum 100K potential backers
